title: Appending Variables to Strings
content: Just as you can build a string over multiple lines out of strings literals, we can also append variables to a string using the plus equals(+=) operator.
ourStr would have the value 'freeCodeCamp is awesome!'

exercises.instruction: Set someAdjective to a string of at least 3 characters and append it to myStr using the += operator

hint: someAdjective should be set to a string at least 3 charcters long.
You should append someAdjective to myStr using the += operator.
